Details.Patch-Desc: Upgrades OS to Latest Patch Bundle
Details.Subject: v_SUBJECT
Details.Description: For SFDC Compliance, we need to upgrade the below hosts
Details.Implementation: Connect to ops-release hosts and run: katzmeow.pl --case <00000000> --impl
Details.Business-Justification: Hosts need to be updated to the latest revision for compliance and security reasons
Details.Backout: This is a fix forward rollback
Details.Risk-Summary:Test Details: Has been tested in the IST environment
Details.Impact-Summary: Low impact due to validations within ORB framework

Verif: Ensure Host has been rebooted and its uptime is less than 300:
All checks will be included in the validation code
